resources.string: Please touch your university ID card on the card reader, \n\nOR enter your username and password below to log in.
No relevant result found on database. Please check your spelling and try again.
using stairs or lift, and follow the detailed path on that floor as displayed.

• Please enter a valid room number if you are heading to a specific room inside the building.

• In the case of searching for the path to an academic staff's office, please enter the full name of the staff, dropping the title. Please make sure that the staff you are looking for is based in this building.

• Try search using the room functionality, e.g. "Meeting Room".

• Try search for some additional facilities within the building, e.g. "vending machine", "toilet".
Please select one staff on the left hand side to view details. \nUse the filter on the top to filter results.
Please select one laboratory on the left hand side to view details. \nUse the filter on the top to filter results.
